summary.span: 表示与 相关的参数集合及其各自到 中列的映射。

span.span: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an as well as their respective mappings to columns in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的参数数量必须等于的命令文本中的参数占位符的个数，否则适用于 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序可能会引发错误。The number of parameters in the collection must equal the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, otherwise the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB might raise an error. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的多个实例通过内的集合， 。The following example creates multiple instances of through the collection within the . 这些参数用于选择数据源中的数据，在其中放置数据。These parameters are used to select data within the data source and place the data in the . 此示例假定和一个已创建与相应的架构、 命令和连接。This example assumes that a and an have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载时要格外小心方法，以便指定整数参数值。Use caution when using this overload of the method to specify integer parameter values. 因为此重载接受`value`类型的，你必须将值转换为键入时的值为零，如下面的 C# 示例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果不执行此转换，则编译器将假定尝试调用重载。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the overload.

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例将搜索与给定内。The following example searches for an with a given within an . 如果该参数存在，该示例显示的名称和参数的索引。If the parameter exists, the example displays the name and index of the parameter. 如果该参数不存在，该示例将显示错误。If the parameter does not exist, the example displays an error. 此示例假定已创建。This example assumes that an has already been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
